definitions.title: gent. 1. Lud, Lydia,
definitions.body: As. Luddu:—[[אַרְפַּכְשַׁד וְלוּד וַאֲרָם]] Ge 10:22 = 1Ch 1:17 LXX Loud.

appar. a people in NE. Africa [[תַּרְשִׁישׁ פּוּל וְלוּד]] Is 66:19, LXX Loud; ´[[וּפוּט פָּרַס וְל]] Ez Eze 27:10; [[כּוּשׁ וּפוּט וְלוּד]] Eze 30:5 ( + [[לוּב]] q. v.), in both LXX L(o)udoi; also pl. [[לוּדִים]] a ‘son’ of Miṣraim, Ge 10:13 LXX Ludieim (‖[[לְהָבִים]]) = 1Ch 1:11 ([[לוּדִי֠ים]]); Je 46:9 (‖[[פּוּט]],[[כּוּשׁ ]]) v. [[לוּב]] supr.—On this African [[לוּד]] v. Di:Ge 10:13, opp. Sta:Javan 5 ff. cf. WMM:As. Eur. 115.
